todos.title: “A move must respond to the opponent.”
“Abandon small to save big.”
“Against strong positions, play safely (contrast your opponents strategy).”
“Be unhurried to enter the opponent’s territory.”
“Discard a stone to gain sente (initiative).
“Greedy do not get success”
“Look for peace, avoid fighting in an isolated or weak situation.”
“Make thick shape, avoid hasty moves.”
“Take care of oneself when attacking the other.”
“When in danger, sacrifice.”
GAME OF GO THEORIES
GO Quotes
Inexperienced players aren’t good at estimating territory.
Inexperienced players don’t analyze profit v. cost, odds and return (poker).
Inexperienced players don’t control the initiative (you want to lead the game so that
Inexperienced players don’t pay attention to the entire board.
Inexperienced players follow their opponent blindly.
Inexperienced players get jealous of opponent’s position.
Inexperienced players succumb to wishful thinking.
opponents are more worried about preventing losses that they don’t focus on securing wins).
